sections.title: Precise Position Control
sections.content: Servos are motors designed for precise position control, commonly used for arms, claws, and other mechanisms.

sections.title: Servo Facts
sections.subtitle: What makes servos special?
items: Move to a specific angle or position
Continuous rotation servos: spin like a motor

sections.title: Basic Servo Control
sections.code:
Servo claw = hardwareMap.get(Servo.class, "claw_servo");
claw.setPosition(0.5); // Move to middle position

sections.title: Applications
sections.content: Use servos for mechanisms that require repeatable, precise movement.
